textDetails.descriptionText: This survey will ask you about what kind of data you want to scrape off of Twitch using their API.\nAt the end, we will generate working code for you to match your described use case.

questionDetails.questionTitle: API Wrapper Language
questionDetails.questionDescription: Specify what language(s) you are using for development.

questionDetails.questionTitle: What kind of content do you want to scrape?
How do you want to search for videos?
questionDetails.questionDescription: Select multiple options to combine them.\n - For example, "All videos by a specific streamer" + "All videos in a certain view count rage" = "All videos by a specific streamer in a certain view count range"
choices: All videos by a specific streamer
All videos in a certain view count range
All videos of a certain game/category
A video with a specific ID
All videos with a matching title

questionDetails.questionTitle: How do you want to specify the streamer?

renderCondition.questionValue: All videos by a specific streamer

questionDetails.questionTitle: What is their streamer ID or username?
questionDetails.questionDescription: Use the option you selected above.

renderCondition.questionValue: Yes

questionDetails.questionTitle: Do you want to hardcode for a specific streamer?
questionDetails.questionDescription: If you say no, the code we generate will be able to search for any given streamer

questionDetails.questionTitle: Minimum number of views
questionDetails.questionDescription: Filter out all videos with views below this number.

renderCondition.questionValue: All videos in a certain view count range

questionDetails.questionTitle: Maximum number of views
questionDetails.questionDescription: Filter out all videos with views above this number. If you don't want a max, just set it as a really large number

renderCondition.questionValue: All videos in a certain view count range

questionDetails.questionTitle: How do you want to specify what game/category you are looking for?

renderCondition.questionValue: All videos of a certain game/category

questionDetails.questionTitle: Do you want to hardcode for a specific game/category?
questionDetails.questionDescription: If you say no, the code we generate will be able to search for any given game/category

renderCondition.questionValue: All videos of a certain game/category

questionDetails.questionTitle: What is the name or ID of the game/category?
questionDetails.questionDescription: Use the option you selected above

renderCondition.questionValue: Yes

textDetails.descriptionText: When streamers save a livestream to their profile, that is renamed to be a video.\nWhen a livestream becomes a video, its view count resets. Because of this, videos tend to have significantly fewer views.

questionDetails.questionTitle: Do you want to hardcode for a specific video ID?
questionDetails.questionDescription: If you say no, the generated code will be able to search for videos with any given video ID.

renderCondition.questionValue: A video with a specific ID

questionDetails.questionTitle: Hardcoded video ID

renderCondition.questionValue: Yes

questionDetails.questionTitle: Do you want to hardcode for a specific video title?
questionDetails.questionDescription: If you say no, the generated code will be able to serach for videos with any given video title.

renderCondition.questionValue: All videos with a matching title

questionDetails.questionTitle: Hardcoded video title

renderCondition.questionValue: Yes
Saved Videos

questionDetails.questionTitle: What kind of streamers are you looking for?
questionDetails.questionDescription: Select all that apply. Selecting multiple options will combine them.
choices: Streamers within a certain follower count range
Streamers within a certain subscriber count range
Streamers who have been on Twitch for a certain amount of time
A streamer with a specific username or ID

questionDetails.questionTitle: Minimum number of followers
questionDetails.questionDescription: Filter out all streamers with fewer followers than this.

renderCondition.questionValue: Streamers within a certain follower count range

questionDetails.questionTitle: Maximum number of followers
questionDetails.questionDescription: Filter out all streamers with more followers than this.

renderCondition.questionValue: Streamers within a certain follower count range

questionDetails.questionTitle: Minimum number of subscribers
questionDetails.questionDescription: Filter out all streamers with fewer subscribers than this.

renderCondition.questionValue: Streamers within a certain subscriber count range

questionDetails.questionTitle: Maximum number of subscribers
questionDetails.questionDescription: Filter out all streamers with more subscribers than this.

renderCondition.questionValue: Streamers within a certain subscriber count range

questionDetails.questionTitle: Earliest date for streamer to have joined Twitch
questionDetails.questionDescription: Filter out all streamers who joined Twitch before this date.

renderCondition.questionValue: Streamers who have been on Twitch for a certain amount of time

questionDetails.questionTitle: Latest date for streamer to have joined Twitch
questionDetails.questionDescription: Filter out all streamers who joined Twitch after this date\n

renderCondition.questionValue: Streamers who have been on Twitch for a certain amount of time

questionDetails.questionTitle: How do you want to specify the specific streamer?

renderCondition.questionValue: A streamer with a specific username or ID

questionDetails.questionTitle: Do you want to hardcode for a specific streamer?
questionDetails.questionDescription: If you say no, the code we generate will be able to search for any given streamer

renderCondition.questionValue: A streamer with a specific username or ID

questionDetails.questionTitle: What is the name or ID of the streamer?

renderCondition.questionValue: Yes

questionDetails.questionTitle: What kind of livestreams are you looking for?
questionDetails.questionDescription: Select all that apply. Selecting multiple will combine them.
choices: Livestreams within a certain view range

questionDetails.questionTitle: Minimum number of views
questionDetails.questionDescription: Filter out all livestreams with fewer views than this.

renderCondition.questionValue: Livestreams within a certain view range

questionDetails.questionDescription: Filter out all livestreams with more views than this.

renderCondition.questionValue: Livestreams within a certain view range

questionDetails.questionDescription: If you say no, the generated code will be able to search for any given game/category

questionDetails.questionTitle: Hardcode streamer?
questionDetails.questionDescription: If you say no, the generated code will be able to search for any given streamer

Livestreams

questionDetails.questionTitle: What do you want to sort by?
Which direction do you want to sort?

textDetails.descriptionText: Note: sorting will be done in the order you specify here.\nThis means that if you choose "By views" and then "By followers", the result will be sorted by view count and ties will be broken by follower count.
textDetails.titleText: Sort the results of your API query
